summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the newly added About Us page. The About page implementation is excellent with all required content present and correct Azerbaijani text. Navigation from header works correctly. Found minor UI overlay issues affecting some interactions.

ui_bugs.issue: Dark mode toggle button found but doesn't change theme state

integration_issues.issue: Language dropdown and other header dropdowns create overlay that blocks navigation clicks

passed_tests: About page loads correctly at /about route
Navigation from homepage to /about works correctly
About page hero section with correct heading 'Haqqımızda'
Company tagline 'TourAgent Travel – səyahətinizi əsl agentə etibar edin!' present
All 4 hero stats present: 5000+ (Mutlu Müştəri), 2022 (Təsis ili), 7/24 (Müştəri Dəstəyi), 50+ (Ölkə)
Main content section with 'Peşəkar Turizm Xidmətlərimiz' heading
Company description text starting with 'TourAgent Travel 2022-ci ildə təsis olunmuş'
All 6 service detail cards present: Aviabilet Xidməti, Turpaketlərin Təşkili, Xarici Turpaketlər, Xüsusi Turlar, Transfer və VİP Xidmətlər, Viza Dəstəyi
7/24 support section with heading 'Bütün xidmətlərimiz boyunca yanınızdayıq'
Phone button with '444 0 387' text and correct tel: link
WhatsApp button with correct WhatsApp link in support section
CTA section with 'Səyahət planlarınızı bizimlə bölüşün' heading
'Bizimlə Əlaqə' button present in CTA section
'WhatsApp ilə Yazın' button present in CTA section
About page content fully responsive and visually correct
All Azerbaijani text content accurate and properly displayed
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dark mode toggle functionality on About page - button is present but doesn't change theme state. Also improve overlay management for header dropdowns to prevent navigation blocking.
